SEARCH
Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse ChangeSceneTransition

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ChangeSceneTransition
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Renderable
public abstract class ChangeSceneTransition extends Object implements Renderable
The abstract class ChangeSceneTransition contains methods for managing time and frames in a scene transition effect.

      public void setDeltaTime(double deltaTime)
      This function sets the value of deltaTime for an object.
      Parameter:
      deltaTime - deltaTime is a variable of type double that represents the time difference between two consecutive updates in a simulation or game loop.
